### TBIPS IT/Cyber Security (Set-Aside) Tender Notice
#### Overview
The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) issues this tender notice for the provision of professional services for IT/Cyber Security activities. This requirement is open only to Qualified Suppliers who have been classified as Tier 1 for IT Services under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement in the National Capital Region.

#### Contract Requirements
The incumbent will provide services on an "as-and-when-required" basis through Task Authorizations (TAs). They will perform, verify, analyze, design, test, assess, and monitor various IT/Cyber Security activities for ISC and Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) programs, applications, and systems.

The contract will be awarded for an initial two-year period, with the option to extend for a maximum of three one-year periods. 

#### Required Consultancy Services
The incumbent must provide services in the following categories, with each category/band identified as follows:

* B.1 Business Analyst Level 3
* C.2 IT Security Methodology, Policy, and Procedures Analyst Level 3
* C.3 IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst Level 3
* C.7 IT Security Design Specialist Level 3
* C.11 IT Security VA Specialist Level 3
